about_the_game:
Explore what the backrooms offer in this infinitely expansive realm of space.

I’m this DLC, you can expect to see a new addition(almost like a new game). This may not be the most… appropriate DLC out there but it was suggested so here it is. There will be much wanted VR support so buckle up for that. Unlock new skins, new game styles, and show off to your friends that you have purchased either the best item or wrist item in your steam wish list(up to you to decide ;))

VR SUPPORT
With VR support you can see the entities as if they are life-sized, you can feel the fear as if it's real, and you can scare your friends for all eternity as there isn't a known ending to the backrooms. It is tons of fun for those stingy friend groups. Been tearing friends apart since day 1 not responsible for the loss of friendships

ENDLESS LEVELS
With each level are multiple exits that lead you away from reality(or closer if you're lucky). Will you risk it all? Or will you stay in the safe zones for as long as you can? careful. Nobody knows if those zones are really "safe" :)

ENTITIES
With so many entities, some you may encounter and not know they are in the game. Not all entities are playable. But all playable entities are active. Each entity is unique in its own way with special abilities that it has gained based on its habitat. Remember, if you can go between levels. So can they.

content_descriptors.notes: Acts of violence, blood, and some gore are present. Viewer discretion is highly advised.

name: Backrooms Versus - The “Don’t Buy”  Expansion
short_description: Ever wanted to have a game inside of a game? Well this DLC is packed full of questionable content that I’ll have to explain over holiday dinner with family. So enjoy all the questionable gameplay and additions included in tnis overpriced “masterpiece”. {achievement included}
